definition: to compare/to dispute/compared to/(before adj.) relatively/comparatively/rather/also pr. [jiao3]
erhua variant of 較真|较真[jiao4 zhen1]

sentences.english: Don't take everything too seriously. It is not worth it.
sentences.chinese: 不要對什麼事都較真，它們並不值得你較真。

sentences.english: Don't take everything too seriously. It is not worth it.
sentences.chinese: 不要對什麼事都較真，它們並不值得你較真。

sentences.english: As always, we caution readers not to make too much of these findings.
sentences.chinese: 一如往常，我們提醒讀者不要對這些發現太較真。

sentences.english: Try to let partners who are getting serious about you down easy or revenge can be expected.
sentences.chinese: 試着讓較真兒的對方放鬆下來，否則會有報復行爲哦。

sentences.english: No offense, but don't you think you're a little outmatched ?
sentences.chinese: 我沒惡意不過你不覺得你有點太較真了嗎？

sentences.english: My new boss is so strict about the rules.
sentences.chinese: 我的新老闆對這條規定特別較真兒。
